Along with his Pirate Bay co-founders, he faces $13 million in damage claims to Hollywood in a copyright infringement case. Fredrik is on his way to install a new computer in the secret server hall. This is where the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s largest file sharing site is hidden.

When the hacker prodigy Gottfrid, the internet activist Peter and the network nerd Fredrik are found guilty, they are confronted with the reality of life offline Ã¢â‚¬â€œ away from keyboard. But deep down in dark data centres, clandestine computers quietly continue to duplicate files.
